socioeconomic_impact_studies.measure: Qualitative description of quality of life (WHOQOL-BREF)
socioeconomic_impact_studies.label: Quality of life in patients with oculocutaneous albinism

socioeconomic_impact_studies.measure: Qualitative description of financial burden and access challenges
socioeconomic_impact_studies.label: A case for the inclusion of oculocutaneous albinism as a skin-related Neglected Tropical Disease

justification: Only qualitative studies describing impairment in quality of life and financial or access challenges were identified; no quantitative cost-of-illness data were available.
